overview:
Ashley Qualls began WhateverLife.com in 2004, and has been building on it ever since. What began as a personal resource website, has bloomed into an empowering creative social network for tweens, teens, & even adults.

When not working on side projects and companies, Ashley is an admitted self-proclaimed Web, Graphic, & Interior designer. Her true passion is design, hence sharing it with the world.

Ashley hopes to continue working with technology & art together, but also hopes to expand to plenty more businesses by the time she’s 30!
